fruits.title: Pineapple
fruits.description: A tropical fruit with a sweet, tangy flavor and a tough, spiky exterior. Pineapples are rich in vitamins, enzymes, and antioxidants.

fruits.title: Apple
fruits.description: Crisp, juicy apples are perfect for snacking and come in a variety of flavors, from sweet to tart. Packed with fiber and vitamin C.

fruits.title: Orange
fruits.description: Oranges are juicy and sweet with a vibrant color. They are an excellent source of vitamin C and other essential nutrients.

fruits.title: Banana
fruits.description: Bananas are a convenient and nutritious snack, rich in potassium, and offer a quick energy boost with their natural sugars.

vegetables.title: Beetroot
vegetables.description: Beetroots are known for their deep red color and earthy flavor. They are rich in essential nutrients, such as fiber, folate, and vitamin C.

vegetables.title: Carrot
vegetables.description: Crunchy and sweet, carrots are an excellent source of beta-carotene, fiber, vitamin K, and antioxidants.

vegetables.title: Cabbage
vegetables.description: Cabbage is a leafy green vegetable known for its versatility in cooking. It's high in vitamins C and K and can be enjoyed raw or cooked.

beverages.title: Avocado Juice
beverages.description: Creamy and nutritious, avocado juice is a delightful beverage rich in healthy fats, vitamins, and minerals.

beverages.title: Orange Juice
beverages.description: Refreshing and tangy, orange juice is a favorite breakfast drink packed with vitamin C and antioxidants.

beverages.title: Coca Cola
beverages.description: Coca Cola is a classic carbonated soft drink known for its unique taste and refreshing qualities.

beverages.title: Sprite
beverages.description: Sprite is a lemon-lime flavored soft drink, crisp and refreshing, perfect for quenching your thirst.

snacks.title: Chips
snacks.description: Crispy and delicious, these chips are the perfect snack for any time of the day, made from the finest potatoes.

snacks.title: French Fries
snacks.description: Golden and crispy, French fries are a popular snack and side dish, enjoyed by people of all ages.

snacks.title: Potato Chips
snacks.description: These potato chips are crunchy and savory, a classic snack thatâ€™s perfect for any occasion.

snacks.title: Tip Tip
snacks.description: Tip Tip snacks are a delightful mix of flavors and textures, perfect for munching anytime.
